title: Bo Bo Lixian Ji
synopsis: Sky Island, once used as a pirate airport for pirates to come and go, is very prosperous and lively. Due to the end of the great nautical era, this place has gradually been forgotten. The island is now a beautiful and tranquil island, far away from the hustle and bustle, people love peace, and live a simple and happy life. However, a man named Blackbeard Dickey People often come to the sky island under the guise of "promoting trade", forcing the islanders to exchange unequal goods with him, disturbing the peaceful life here... 　　 Bobo is an orphan, living alone in a tree house on the sky island. He has a treasure, it is the captain's diary, but because he is illiterate, he knows little about the contents of the diary. In addition, because his childhood memories and fantasy are intertwined, the true origin of this diary has become confusing, but he has always stubbornly believed that he is the son of a great pirate. His dream is to one day become a great pirate and explorer, and find his father.(translated from iqiyi)
